title: Faculty Capacity-Building Program for Supporting Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Educational Administration and Leadership
context.additional_context: Practical training-focused education for science field education administrators to establish support systems for students with disabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more assessment tools to analyze the learning needs of students with disabilities.
Learners can develop science-subject lesson designs incorporating assistive technology and universal design principles.
Via team-based project evaluations, learners can establish practical plans to implement inclusive educational environments for students with disabilities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
